title: Emotion Detection (SemEval-2018 Task 1)
description: Multi-label emotion classification with intensity ratings based on SemEval-2018 Task 1. Annotate text for emotions (anger, anticipation, disgust, fear, joy, love, optimism, pessimism, sadness, surprise, trust) with intensity scales.
citation:

    booktitle = "Proceedings of The 12th International Workshop on Semantic Evaluation",
    month = jun,
    year = "2018",
    address = "New Orleans, Louisiana",
    publisher = "Association for Computational Linguistics",
    url = "https://aclanthology.org/S18-1001",
    pages = "1--17"
